data.title: Driftwood Press: A Literary Endeavor by James McNulty, Jerrod Schwarz — Kickstarter
data.name: James McNulty, Jerrod Schwarz
data.description: Encouraged by the success of our debut issue, Driftwood Press is looking to publish print editions, pay our authors, and keep afloat.

data.title: Fireside Magazine Year 3 by Brian White — Kickstarter
data.name: Brian White
data.description: We have two goals: finding and publishing great storytelling regardless of genre, and fair pay for creators.
